name: taketori wars
description:
This is a short shooter game based on "Taketori Monogatari" (The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter).
You are a round-shaped guy can shoot rocket propelled bamboos against moon rabbits. Shoot'em and prevent kidnapping princess(es) from the Earth!

Staff

  • Game Design: OtObOx, tanitta
  • Graphic: tanitta
  • Programming: tanitta
  • Sound: OtObOx
  • Debug: OtObOx, maria, zaslon, tanitta
